cssmd:property-def.description: Color of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown burlywood cadetblue chartreuse chocolate coral cornflowerblue cornsilk crimson cyan darkblue darkcyan darkgoldenrod darkgray darkgreen darkgrey darkkhaki darkmagenta darkolivegreen darkorange darkorchid darkred darksalmon darkseagreen darkslateblue darkslategray darkslategrey darkturquoise darkviolet deeppink deepskyblue dimgray dimgrey dodgerblue firebrick floralwhite forestgreen fuchsia gainsboro ghostwhite gold goldenrod gray green greenyellow grey honeydew hotpink indianred indigo ivory khaki lavender lavenderblush lawngreen lemonchiffon lightblue lightcoral lightcyan lightgoldenrodyellow lightgray lightgreen lightgrey lightpink lightsalmon lightseagreen lightskyblue lightslategray lightslategrey lightsteelblue lightyellow lime limegreen linen magenta maroon mediumaquamarine mediumblue mediumorchid mediumpurple mediumseagreen mediumslateblue mediumspringgreen mediumturquoise mediumvioletred midnightblue mintcream mistyrose moccasin navajowhite navy oldlace olive olivedrab orange orangered orchid palegoldenrod palegreen paleturquoise palevioletred papayawhip peachpuff peru pink plum powderblue purple red rosybrown royalblue saddlebrown salmon sandybrown seagreen seashell sienna silver skyblue slateblue slategray slategrey snow springgreen steelblue tan teal thistle tomato turquoise violet wheat white whitesmoke yellow yellowgreen currentColor transparent ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The transparency of an element
This property permits the specification of a source color profile other than the default
This property permits the specification of a color profile rendering intent other than the default
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto perceptual relative-colorimetric saturation absolute-colorimetric inherit

How the background image is tiled within an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit no-repeat repeat repeat-x repeat-y round space

cssmd:property-def.description: How the background image is attached to an element within the document
How the background is positioned within an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: bottom center left right top inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: How the background is positioned within an element
How the background is positioned within an element
The clipping rectangle which determines the background painting area
The background positioning area of an element
The size of background images
The size of background images
The size of background images
Background of an element

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether individual boxes are treated as broken pieces of one continuous box, or whether each box is individually wrapped with the border and padding
The shape of a specific corner of the outer border edge
The shape of a specific corner of the outer border edge
The shape of a specific corner of the outer border edge
The shape of a specific corner of the outer border edge
The shape of the corner of the outer border edge
Image used for a border style
Inward offsets on the border image to break it into 9 regions
Specifies offsets that are used to divide the border image area into nine parts
Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box
Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box
Shorthand for specifying the properties of an image used as a border style
Shorthand for specifying the properties of a box shadow
Shorthand for specifying the properties of a text shadow
Shadow x offset
Shadow y offset
Shadow blur radius
Shadow blur radius
The color the shadow casts
cssmd:property-def.enum: aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown burlywood cadetblue chartreuse chocolate coral cornflowerblue cornsilk crimson cyan darkblue darkcyan darkgoldenrod darkgray darkgreen darkgrey darkkhaki darkmagenta darkolivegreen darkorange darkorchid darkred darksalmon darkseagreen darkslateblue darkslategray darkslategrey darkturquoise darkviolet deeppink deepskyblue dimgray dimgrey dodgerblue firebrick floralwhite forestgreen fuchsia gainsboro ghostwhite gold goldenrod gray green greenyellow grey honeydew hotpink indianred indigo ivory khaki lavender lavenderblush lawngreen lemonchiffon lightblue lightcoral lightcyan lightgoldenrodyellow lightgray lightgreen lightgrey lightpink lightsalmon lightseagreen lightskyblue lightslategray lightslategrey lightsteelblue lightyellow lime limegreen linen magenta maroon mediumaquamarine mediumblue mediumorchid mediumpurple mediumseagreen mediumslateblue mediumspringgreen mediumturquoise mediumvioletred midnightblue mintcream mistyrose moccasin navajowhite navy oldlace olive olivedrab orange orangered orchid palegoldenrod palegreen paleturquoise palevioletred papayawhip peachpuff peru pink plum powderblue purple red rosybrown royalblue saddlebrown salmon sandybrown seagreen seashell sienna silver skyblue slateblue slategray slategrey snow springgreen steelblue tan teal thistle tomato turquoise violet wheat white whitesmoke yellow yellowgreen transparent currentColor ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Shadow type (inset or drop)
The transition-property property specifies the name of the CSS property to which the transition is applied
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One or more of the css properties that can be used to create transitions
cssmd:property-def.enum: background-color background-image background-position border-bottom-color border-bottom-width border-color border-left-color border-left-width border-right-color border-right-width border-spacing border-top-color border-top-width border-width bottom color crop font-size font-weight grid- height left letter-spacing line-height margin-bottom margin-left margin-right margin-top max-height max-width min-height min-width opacity outline-color outline-offset outline-width padding-bottom padding-left padding-right padding-top right text-indent text-shadow top vertical-align visibility width word-spacing z-index zoom

cssmd:property-def.description: The transition-duration property defines the length of time that a transition takes
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Duration time in seconds or milli-seconds

cssmd:property-def.description: Describes how the intermediate values used during a transition will be calculated
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Cubic bezier functions or pre-defined timing functions
cssmd:property-def.enum: ease linear ease-in ease-out ease-in-out cubic-bezier() inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The transition-delay property defines when the transition will start
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Delay time in seconds or milli-seconds

cssmd:property-def.description: The transition shorthand property combines the four transition properties described above into a single property
Defines a list of animations that apply based on the keyframe at-rule name
Defines the length of time that an animation takes to complete one cycle
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Duration time in seconds or milli-seconds

cssmd:property-def.description: The animation-timing-function property describes how the animation will progress over one cycle of its duration
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Cubic bezier functions or pre-defined timing functions
cssmd:property-def.enum: ease linear ease-in ease-out ease-in-out cubic-bezier() inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The animation-iteration-count property defines the number of times an animation cycle is played
The animation-direction property defines whether or not the animation should play in reverse on alternate cycles
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the animation-direction property values

cssmd:property-def.description: The animation-play-state property defines whether the animation is running or paused
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the animation-play-state property values

cssmd:property-def.description: The animation-delay property defines when the animation will start
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Delay time in seconds or milli-seconds

cssmd:property-def.description: The animation shorthand property combines the six animation properties described above into a single property
A two-dimensional transformation is applied to an element through the transform property
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One or more of the transform functions
cssmd:property-def.enum: matrix() matrix3d() translate() translate3d() translateX() translateY() translateZ() scale() scale3d() scaleX() scaleY() scaleZ() rotate() rotate3d() rotateX() rotateY() rotateZ() skewX() skewY() skew() perspective()

cssmd:property-def.description: The transform-origin property establishes the origin of transformation for an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One or more of the transform-origin values| a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: The transform-style property defines how nested elements are rendered in 3D space
The perspective property applies the same transform as the perspective function, to the children of the element
The perspective-origin property establishes the origin of the perspective property
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One or more of the perspective-origin values | a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: Determines whether or not the back side of a transformed element is visible when facing the viewer
This property specifies the preferred scrolling method for elements that overflow
This property specifies the scrolling behavior for elements that overflow
This property specifies how many times the content moves
This property determines the initial direction in which the content moves if the marquee effect is used
This property determines how fast the content scrolls
This property specifies the size and orientation of the containing box for page content, the page box
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto landscape portrait A5 A4 A3 B5 B4 letter legal ledger

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks before an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: always auto avoid left right inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks after an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: always auto avoid left right inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks inside an element
The page property can be used to specify a particular type of page where an element should be displayed
Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the bottom of a page
Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the top of a page
Determines which page-based occurance of a given element is applied to a counter or string value
Specifies a rotation in the right or clockwise direction that a user agent applies to an image
Gives a hint for how to scale a replaced element if neither its width nor its height property is auto
The 'fit-position' determines the alignment of the object inside the box
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit auto top center bottom left right

cssmd:property-def.description: This property declares whether and how white space inside the element is collapsed
The 'white-space' property is a shorthand for the 'white-space-collapse' and 'text-wrap' properties
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit normal pre nowrap pre-wrap pre-line

cssmd:property-def.description: This property specifies what set of line breaking restrictions are in effect within the element
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit normal keep-all loose break-strict break-all

cssmd:property-def.description: This property specifies the mode for text wrapping
This property specifies whether the UA may break within a word to prevent overflow
The horizontal alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: center end justify left right start inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: How the last line of a block is aligned when text-align is set to justify
cssmd:property-def.enum: start end left right center justify inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Selects the justification method used when 'text-align' is set to justify
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto inter-word inter-ideograph inter-cluster distribute kashida tibetan inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The spacing between words
The spacing between characters
Determines whether or not a fullwidth punctuation character should be trimmed (kerned).
cssmd:property-def.enum: none start end allow-end adjacent inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: This property governs the color of emphasis formatting applied to text
cssmd:property-def.enum: aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown burlywood cadetblue chartreuse chocolate coral cornflowerblue cornsilk crimson cyan darkblue darkcyan darkgoldenrod darkgray darkgreen darkgrey darkkhaki darkmagenta darkolivegreen darkorange darkorchid darkred darksalmon darkseagreen darkslateblue darkslategray darkslategrey darkturquoise darkviolet deeppink deepskyblue dimgray dimgrey dodgerblue firebrick floralwhite forestgreen fuchsia gainsboro ghostwhite gold goldenrod gray green greenyellow grey honeydew hotpink indianred indigo ivory khaki lavender lavenderblush lawngreen lemonchiffon lightblue lightcoral lightcyan lightgoldenrodyellow lightgray lightgreen lightgrey lightpink lightsalmon lightseagreen lightskyblue lightslategray lightslategrey lightsteelblue lightyellow lime limegreen linen magenta maroon mediumaquamarine mediumblue mediumorchid mediumpurple mediumseagreen mediumslateblue mediumspringgreen mediumturquoise mediumvioletred midnightblue mintcream mistyrose moccasin navajowhite navy oldlace olive olivedrab orange orangered orchid palegoldenrod palegreen paleturquoise palevioletred papayawhip peachpuff peru pink plum powderblue purple red rosybrown royalblue saddlebrown salmon sandybrown seagreen seashell sienna silver skyblue slateblue slategray slategrey snow springgreen steelblue tan teal thistle tomato turquoise violet wheat white whitesmoke yellow yellowgreen currentColor transparent ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: This property applies emphasis formatting applied to text
cssmd:property-def.enum: none filled open dot circle double-circle triangle sesame inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: This property applies emphasis formatting applied to text
This property applies emphasis formatting applied to text
Specifies a text outline representing the outlines thickness and optional blur radius
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | [ color length length | length length color ]

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies the indentation applied to lines of inline content in a block
Determines whether a punctuation mark may be placed outside the line box at the start or at the end
Used on any element to control the text alignment of the ruby text and ruby base contents
Used to control the position of the ruby text with respect to its base
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto start left center end right distribute-letter distribute-space line-edge inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Determines whether, and on which side, ruby text is allowed to partially overhang any adjacent text
This property controls the spanning behavior of annotation elements
Name of the font used for an element's text
Boldness of the font used for an element's text
Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal ultra-condensed extra-condensed condensed semi-condensed semi-expanded expanded extra-expanded ultra-expanded inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Style of the font used for an element's text
Size of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: length | percentage | standard font size value
cssmd:property-def.enum: xx-small x-small small medium large x-large xx-large smaller larger inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Adjusts the relative height of lowercase letters compared to uppercase
Font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit caption icon menu message-box small-caption status-bar

cssmd:property-def.description: A value that indicates whether lines are automatically broken inside the object
Specifies control over which ligatures are enabled or disabled
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal inherit common-ligatures no-common-ligatures additional-ligatures no-additional-ligatures historical-ligatures no-historical-ligatures

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies control over capitalized forms
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal small-caps all-small-caps petite-caps all-petite-caps titling-caps unicase inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies control over which numeric variants are enabled or disabled
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal inherit lining-nums oldstyle-nums proportional-nums tabular-nums diagonal-fractions stacked-fractions

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies control over which east asian font variants are enabled or disabled
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal inherit hojo-kanji jis78 jis83 jis90 jis04 nlckanji simplified() traditional() full-width proportional-width

cssmd:property-def.description: Variant of the font used for an element's text
Specifies the language to use when different from the language of the document
Decorations applied to font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: none underline overline line-through blink inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Decorations applied to font used for an element's text
This property specifies the color of text decoration (underlines overlines, and line-throughs) set on the element
cssmd:property-def.enum: aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown burlywood cadetblue chartreuse chocolate coral cornflowerblue cornsilk crimson cyan darkblue darkcyan darkgoldenrod darkgray darkgreen darkgrey darkkhaki darkmagenta darkolivegreen darkorange darkorchid darkred darksalmon darkseagreen darkslateblue darkslategray darkslategrey darkturquoise darkviolet deeppink deepskyblue dimgray dimgrey dodgerblue firebrick floralwhite forestgreen fuchsia gainsboro ghostwhite gold goldenrod gray green greenyellow grey honeydew hotpink indianred indigo ivory khaki lavender lavenderblush lawngreen lemonchiffon lightblue lightcoral lightcyan lightgoldenrodyellow lightgray lightgreen lightgrey lightpink lightsalmon lightseagreen lightskyblue lightslategray lightslategrey lightsteelblue lightyellow lime limegreen linen magenta maroon mediumaquamarine mediumblue mediumorchid mediumpurple mediumseagreen mediumslateblue mediumspringgreen mediumturquoise mediumvioletred midnightblue mintcream mistyrose moccasin navajowhite navy oldlace olive olivedrab orange orangered orchid palegoldenrod palegreen paleturquoise palevioletred papayawhip peachpuff peru pink plum powderblue purple red rosybrown royalblue saddlebrown salmon sandybrown seagreen seashell sienna silver skyblue slateblue slategray slategrey snow springgreen steelblue tan teal thistle tomato turquoise violet wheat white whitesmoke yellow yellowgreen currentColor ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The style of the line(s) drawn for text decoration specified on the element
cssmd:property-def.enum: solid double dotted dashed wave inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: This property specifies what parts of the element's content any text decoration affecting the element must skip over
cssmd:property-def.enum: none images spaces ink all inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Letter case of the text
The display mode of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: inline block inline-block list-item run-in compact table inline-table table-row-group table-header-group table-footer-group table-row table-column-group table-column table-cell table-caption ruby ruby-base ruby-text ruby-base-group ruby-text-group none inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Edge of the object on which text will flow
Sides on which floating objects will not be allowed
The clipping rectangle of an element
Visibility of content extending beyond element's dimensions
Visibility of content extending beyond element's horizontal dimensions
cssmd:property-def.enum: visible hidden scroll auto no-display no-content inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Visibility of content extending beyond element's vertical dimensions
cssmd:property-def.enum: visible hidden scroll auto no-display no-content inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The visibility of an element
Angle of rotation of a box
Rotation-point is a pair of values that defines a point as an offset from the top left border edge
The URL to an icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: auto | inherit | url([url to the cursor resource])

cssmd:property-def.description: The cursor over an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the cursor values | url([url to the cursor resource])
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto default none context-menu help pointer progress wait cell crosshair text vertical-text alias copy move no-drop not-allowed e-resize n-resize ne-resize nw-resize s-resize se-resize sw-resize w-resize ew-resize ns-resize nesw-resize nwse-resize col-resize row-resize all-scroll inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of a positioned element
The height of a positioned element
Constrains box width
Constrains box width
Constrains box height
Constrains box height
The positioning mode of an element
The stacking order of a positioned element
The left edge of a positioned element
The right edge of a positioned element
The top edge of a positioned element
The bottom edge of a positioned element
The padding around all four edges of an element
The padding on the left edge of an element
The padding on the right edge of an element
The padding on the top edge of an element
The padding on the bottom edge of an element
The margin around all four edges of an element
The margin on the left edge of an element
The margin on the right edge of an element
The margin on the top edge of an element
The margin on the bottom edge of an element
This is the behavior of width and height as specified by CSS2.1
This property describes the width of columns in multicol elements
This property describes the number of columns of a multicol element
This is a shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count
The column-gap property sets the gap between columns
This property sets the color of the column rule
cssmd:property-def.enum: aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown burlywood cadetblue chartreuse chocolate coral cornflowerblue cornsilk crimson cyan darkblue darkcyan darkgoldenrod darkgray darkgreen darkgrey darkkhaki darkmagenta darkolivegreen darkorange darkorchid darkred darksalmon darkseagreen darkslateblue darkslategray darkslategrey darkturquoise darkviolet deeppink deepskyblue dimgray dimgrey dodgerblue firebrick floralwhite forestgreen fuchsia gainsboro ghostwhite gold goldenrod gray green greenyellow grey honeydew hotpink indianred indigo ivory khaki lavender lavenderblush lawngreen lemonchiffon lightblue lightcoral lightcyan lightgoldenrodyellow lightgray lightgreen lightgrey lightpink lightsalmon lightseagreen lightskyblue lightslategray lightslategrey lightsteelblue lightyellow lime limegreen linen magenta maroon mediumaquamarine mediumblue mediumorchid mediumpurple mediumseagreen mediumslateblue mediumspringgreen mediumturquoise mediumvioletred midnightblue mintcream mistyrose moccasin navajowhite navy oldlace olive olivedrab orange orangered orchid palegoldenrod palegreen paleturquoise palevioletred papayawhip peachpuff peru pink plum powderblue purple red rosybrown royalblue saddlebrown salmon sandybrown seagreen seashell sienna silver skyblue slateblue slategray slategrey snow springgreen steelblue tan teal thistle tomato turquoise violet wheat white whitesmoke yellow yellowgreen currentColor ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Sets the style of the rule between columns of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove hidden inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: This property sets the width of the rule between columns
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | inherit | One of the border-width values

cssmd:property-def.description: This property is a shorthand for setting column-rule-width, column-rule-style, and column-rule-color
This property describes how many columns an element spans across
Sets the strategy for filling columns
Sets the strategy for determining where column breaks are placed
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit auto always avoid left right page column avoid-page avoid-column

cssmd:property-def.description: Sets the strategy for determining where column breaks are placed
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit auto always avoid left right page column avoid-page avoid-column

cssmd:property-def.description: Sets the strategy for determining where column breaks are placed
The cell layout mode of a table
The table border model
Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Position of the caption box with respect to the table box
Controls rendering of borders around empty cells
Speaking rate
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speech-rate values or integer value in words per minute
cssmd:property-def.enum: fast faster medium slow slower x-fast x-slow inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the pitch values or frequency in hertz
cssmd:property-def.enum: high low medium x-high x-low inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Variation in average pitch. 50 produces normal inflection.
Height of local peaks in the intonation contour of a voice. 50 is a standard English-speaking male voice.
Richness, or brightness, of the speaking voice. Lower values produce softer voice.
Specifies whether table headers are spoken and how
Specifies how puctuation is spoken
Specifies how numerals are spoken
Median volume of the waveform
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the volume values or any number between 0 and 100 or percentage of the inherited value
cssmd:property-def.enum: loud medium silent soft x-loud x-soft inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The voice-volume refers to the amplitude of the waveform output by the speech synthesiser
cssmd:property-def.syntax: inherit | silent | x-soft | soft | medium | loud | x-loud | a number
cssmd:property-def.enum: silent x-soft soft medium loud x-loud inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The voice-balance property refers to the balance between left and right channels
cssmd:property-def.syntax: inherit | left | center | right | leftwards | rightwards | a number
cssmd:property-def.enum: left center right leftwards rightward inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether text will be rendered aurally and in what manner
cssmd:property-def.enum: none normal spell-out digits literal-punctuation no-punctuation inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property
cssmd:property-def.enum: none x-weak weak medium strong x-strong inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause after speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property
cssmd:property-def.enum: none x-weak weak medium strong x-strong inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before and/or after speaking an element content
Specifies a rest before speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property
cssmd:property-def.enum: none x-weak weak medium strong x-strong inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a rest after speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property
cssmd:property-def.enum: none x-weak weak medium strong x-strong inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a rest before and/or after speaking an element content
Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: silent | x-soft | soft | medium | loud | x-loud | none | inherit | url([url to cue image])
cssmd:property-def.enum: silent x-soft soft medium loud x-loud none inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: silent | x-soft | soft | medium | loud | x-loud | none | inherit | url([url to cue image])
cssmd:property-def.enum: silent x-soft soft medium loud x-loud none inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icons
The mark properties allow named markers to be attached to the audio stream
cssmd:property-def.syntax: A string to be used as the name of the mark

cssmd:property-def.description: The mark properties allow named markers to be attached to the audio stream
cssmd:property-def.syntax: A string to be used as the name of the mark

cssmd:property-def.description: The mark properties allow named markers to be attached to the audio stream
Voice family
cssmd:property-def.syntax: List of comma-separated, prioritized list of voice family names

cssmd:property-def.description: This property controls the speaking rate
cssmd:property-def.enum: x-low low medium high x-high inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies the average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: x-low | low | medium | high | x-high | inherit | a number
cssmd:property-def.enum: x-low low medium high x-high inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies variation in average pitch
cssmd:property-def.syntax: x-low | low | medium | high | x-high | inherit | a number
cssmd:property-def.enum: x-low low medium high x-high inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Indicates the strength of emphasis to be applied
This property controls the speaking rate
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value in seconds or milliseconds for the desired time to take to speak the element contents

cssmd:property-def.description: Allows authors to specify a phonetic pronunciation for the text contained by the corresponding element
A box may lay out its children either horizontally or vertically
The box-direction property specifies the direction in which children of a box are displayed
Ordinal groups can be used in conjunction with the box-direction property to control the order in which the direct children of a box appear
The box-align property specifies how a box's children are placed and aligned
cssmd:property-def.enum: start end center baseline stretch inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The box-flex property is a floating point value representing the flexibility of the element
Flexible elements can be assigned to flex groups using the box-flex-group property
Dictates how any additional space along the box-axis should be distributed between elements
Specifies whether a box can expand to multiple rows or columns to accommodate its children
The direction that text flows in
The level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm
cssmd:property-def.enum: bidi-override embed isolate normal plaintext inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Allows the combination of multiple characters into the space of a single glyph
The appearance property can be used to make an element look like a standard user interface element on the platform
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal icon window desktop workspace document tooltip dialog button push-button hyperlink radio-button checkbox menu-item tab menu menubar pull-down-menu pop-up-menu list-menu radio-group checkbox-group outline-tree range field combo-box signature password inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Dynamic outline around visual objects
Width of the outline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the border-width values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Style of the outline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-style values except hidden | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: dashed dotted double groove inset none outset ridge solid inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The color of the outline
cssmd:property-def.enum: aliceblue antiquewhite aqua aquamarine azure beige bisque black blanchedalmond blue blueviolet brown burlywood cadetblue chartreuse chocolate coral cornflowerblue cornsilk crimson cyan darkblue darkcyan darkgoldenrod darkgray darkgreen darkgrey darkkhaki darkmagenta darkolivegreen darkorange darkorchid darkred darksalmon darkseagreen darkslateblue darkslategray darkslategrey darkturquoise darkviolet deeppink deepskyblue dimgray dimgrey dodgerblue firebrick floralwhite forestgreen fuchsia gainsboro ghostwhite gold goldenrod gray green greenyellow grey honeydew hotpink indianred indigo ivory khaki lavender lavenderblush lawngreen lemonchiffon lightblue lightcoral lightcyan lightgoldenrodyellow lightgray lightgreen lightgrey lightpink lightsalmon lightseagreen lightskyblue lightslategray lightslategrey lightsteelblue lightyellow lime limegreen linen magenta maroon mediumaquamarine mediumblue mediumorchid mediumpurple mediumseagreen mediumslateblue mediumspringgreen mediumturquoise mediumvioletred midnightblue mintcream mistyrose moccasin navajowhite navy oldlace olive olivedrab orange orangered orchid palegoldenrod palegreen paleturquoise palevioletred papayawhip peachpuff peru pink plum powderblue purple red rosybrown royalblue saddlebrown salmon sandybrown seagreen seashell sienna silver skyblue slateblue slategray slategrey snow springgreen steelblue tan teal thistle tomato turquoise violet wheat white whitesmoke yellow yellowgreen currentColor ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightText InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLightShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Offset between the border edge and drawn outline
Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user and along which axis
An input-method-neutral way of specifying the sequential navigation order
Element used for directional focus navigation up
cssmd:property-def.syntax: auto | inherit | an id | a target frame

cssmd:property-def.description: Element used for directional focus navigation down
cssmd:property-def.syntax: auto | inherit | an id | a target frame

cssmd:property-def.description: Element used for directional focus navigation right
cssmd:property-def.syntax: auto | inherit | an id | a target frame

cssmd:property-def.description: Element used for directional focus navigation left
cssmd:property-def.syntax: auto | inherit | an id | a target frame

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet characteristics of a list item
The bullet style of a list item
cssmd:property-def.enum: disc circle square decimal decimal-leading-zero lower-roman upper-roman lower-greek lower-latin upper-latin armenian georgian lower-alpha upper-alpha normal none inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet image of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | inherit | url([url to bullet image])

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet position of a list item
Indicates how much the counter is incremented for every occurrence of the element
Defines the value that the counter is set to on each occurrence of the element
Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements to generate content in a document
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Text content | counter | quote values | attr(X)
cssmd:property-def.enum: contents footnote endnote section-note list-item open-quote close-quote no-open-quote no-close-quote inhibit inherit none

cssmd:property-def.description: Causes the element or pseudo-element to be removed from the flow and reinserted at a later point in the document
Quotation marks for any number of embedded quotations
Allows a replaced element to be just a rectangular area of an object, instead of the whole object
Determines the block-progression dimension of the text content area of an inline box
Control the amount of leading space which is added to block-progression dimension of either an inline box, a line box or both
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the line-height values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Determines the line stacking strategy for stacked line boxes within a containing block element
Determines the line stacking method for block elements containing ruby annotation elements
Determines the line stacking method for block elements containing elements with base-shift
Shorthand for specifying line-stacking properties
The dominant-baseline property is used to determine or re-determine a scaled-baseline-table
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto use-script no-change reset-size alphabetic hanging ideographic mathematical central middle text-after-edge text-before-edge inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies how an inline-level element is aligned with respect to its parent
cssmd:property-def.enum: baseline use-script before-edge text-before-edge after-edge text-after-edge central middle ideographic alphabetic hanging mathematical inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Allows more precise alignment of elements, such as graphics, that do not have a baseline-table
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the alignment-adjust values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto baseline before-edge text-before-edge middle central after-edge text-after-edge ideographic alphabetic hanging mathematical inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Allows repositioning of the dominant-baseline relative to the dominant-baseline
cssmd:property-def.syntax: a unit | One of the baseline-shift values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The vertical alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the vertical-align values | a unit
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto use-script baseline sub super top text-top central middle bottom text-bottom inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Determines which line of a multi-line inline block align with the previous and next inline elements within a line
The drop-initial-value property is the basic property that activates a drop-initial effect
The drop-initial-size' property controls the partial sinking of the initial letter
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the drop-initial-size values | a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: Determines which alignment line within the nth line box is used at the primary connection point with the initial letter box
cssmd:property-def.enum: baseline use-script before-edge text-before-edge after-edge text-after-edge central middle ideographic alphabetic hanging mathematical inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The drop-initial-after-adjust property sets the alignment point of the drop initial for the primary connection point
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the drop-initial-after-adjust values | a unit
cssmd:property-def.enum: central middle after-edge text-after-edge ideographic alphabetic mathematical inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Determines which alignment line within the initial line box is used at the secondary connection point with the initial letter box
cssmd:property-def.enum: caps-height baseline use-script before-edge text-before-edge after-edge text-after-edge central middle ideographic alphabetic hanging mathematical inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Sets the alignment point of the drop initial for the secondary connection point
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the drop-initial-before-adjust values | a unit
cssmd:property-def.enum: before-edge text-before-edge central middle hanging mathematical inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The target-name property defines the name of the target destination
cssmd:property-def.syntax: current | root | parent | new | modal | a string

cssmd:property-def.description: The target-new property determines what new target destination (if any) is created
The target-position property indicates where a new destination (if any) is created
Shorthand for specifying target properties
Sound to be played as a background while an element's content is spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the play-during values or url to the sound file

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -360 to 360 degrees range
cssmd:property-def.enum: behind center center-left center-right far-left far-right left left-side leftwards right right-side rightwards inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -90 to 90 degrees range
cssmd:property-def.enum: above below higher level lower inherit

cssmd:pseudoclass-def.description: First line as formatted on the canvas
The n-th child of its parent
The n-th child of its parent, counting from the last one
The n-th sibling of its type
The n-th sibling of its type, counting from the last one
Element that has no children (including text nodes)
Element being the target of the referring URI
A user interface element E which is enabled
A user interface element E which is disabled
A user interface element E which is checked
Element that does not match simple selector s
